English: This is the fifth time I have visited Spain.
Spanish: Esto es la quinta vez que he visitado España.

English: Could you tell me the time?
There are thirty students in the class.
Spanish: Hay treinta estudiantes en la clase.

English: She counted twelve balloons at the party.
Spanish: Ella contó doce globos en la fiesta.

English: The store sells six different brands of shoes.
Spanish: La tienda vende seis marcas diferentes de zapatos.

English: We have been practicing for two hours every day.
Spanish: Hemos estado practicando durante dos horas todos los días.

English: He scored a perfect score in the math test.
Spanish: Él obtuvo una puntuación perfecta en el examen de matemáticas.
